item.title: Time series forecasting error metrics
item.description: In this post, we are going to explore the basic error measures used in time-series forecasting. Error measures provide a way to quantify the quality of a forecasting algorithm (e.g., the performance). First, we briefly introduce time series and the fundamental terms of forecasting. Second, we will introduce the most commonly used error measures and give some examples. Finally, we provide a complete example of using errors in a real-life forecasting scenario.
